name: Smoked Sausage and Cauliflower Fried Rice
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: In partnership with Hillshire Farm Brand, we're helping you make dinner time easy, quick, and delicious. Here, a tasty cauliflower fried rice that's great for a weeknight meal or a casual snack any time.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Rope Smoked Sausage, cut into 1/2" coins
1 medium red bell pepper, cut into strips
directions: In a large nonstick skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of the oil over medium-high
Add sausage; cook about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until lightly browned
Add broccoli and bell pepper; cook 5-6 minutes, stirring occasionally, until broccoli is bright green and slightly tender
Wipe skillet clean-careful, may be hot-reduce heat to medium, and add 1 tablespoon oil
Cook 2-3 minutes until set, stirring once or twice
Transfer to a cutting board and cut into 1/2-inch pieces
Return skillet to stove over medium-high
Add cauliflower; cook, undisturbed, until softened and lightly toasted, about 4 minutes
Stir in soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar, pepper, sausage mixture, and egg
Divide among plates and top with cilantro
